title: Pinocchio (Disney)
creator_credit: Hamilton Luske, Ben Sharpsteen, Walt Disney, RKO Radio Pictures and Walt Disney Pictures
brief_description: This inspiring tale about the magical powers of believing in your dreams is a timeless fantasy that has delighted generations. Winner of two Academy Awards for Best Score and Song, Jiminy Cricket’s “When you wish upon a star.” While kindy toymaker Gepetto sleeps, a blue fairy brings his beloved marionette Pinocchio to life. With the help of his wise friend Jiminy Cricket, Pinocchio begins a voyage that will test his loyalty, bravery and honesty- virtues he must learn to become a real boy. Features the voices of Mel Blanc, Don Brodie, Walter Catlett, Cliff Edwards and others.
